body:
http://imgur.com/p3k8Z4Q,O4qNpLC,0WsDBBX 
http://imgur.com/p3k8Z4Q,O4qNpLC,0WsDBBX#2 
http://imgur.com/p3k8Z4Q,O4qNpLC,0WsDBBX#1 

These are pics of possibly the longest Nebula game EVER. Me, Polar_Express, and Micahb222000 were on nebula this morning defending the monument when we realized that the game is never gonna end because both of the teams were defending, so we took some time and build cool things. Enjoy :D
                 PS:  No, Optic and Cii arn't "together".
